title: Untitled (for now) 7 or Things I Used to Need
medium: Acrylic on and with found objects
description: The painting component of this work shows the model electric lawnmower I used as a teenager. The objects partially obstructing the view of it connects to a personal shift in aesthetic preferences that also aligns with a changing cultural aesthetic. This work attempts to relate imagery and representation to objects and function along a delicate line of comprehension – a line like the remaining one connecting us to things we used to need – things that we have almost forgotten.
